tool.name: OGS: generateStructuredMesh
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'generateStructuredMesh'.
tool.command: generateStructuredMesh --element-type '$element_type' #if str($lx).strip() != 'None' and str($lx).strip() != '': --lx '$lx' #end if #if str($ly).strip() != 'None' and str($ly).strip() != '': --ly '$ly' #end if #if str($lz).strip() != 'None' and str($lz).strip() != '': --lz '$lz' #end if #if str($nx).strip() != 'None' and str($nx).strip() != '': --nx '$nx' #end if #if str($ny).strip() != 'None' and str($ny).strip() != '': --ny '$ny' #end if #if str($nz).strip() != 'None' and str($nz).strip() != '': --nz '$nz' #end if #if str($dx0).strip() != 'None' and str($dx0).strip() != '': --dx0 '$dx0' #end if #if str($dy0).strip() != 'None' and str($dy0).strip() != '': --dy0 '$dy0' #end if #if str($dz0).strip() != 'None' and str($dz0).strip() != '': --dz0 '$dz0' #end if #if str($dx_max).strip() != 'None' and str($dx_max).strip() != '': --dx-max '$dx_max' #end if #if str($dy_max).strip() != 'None' and str($dy_max).strip() != '': --dy-max '$dy_max' #end if #if str($dz_max).strip() != 'None' and str($dz_max).strip() != '': --dz-max '$dz_max' #end if #if str($mx).strip() != 'None' and str($mx).strip() != '': --mx '$mx' #end if #if str($my).strip() != 'None' and str($my).strip() != '': --my '$my' #end if #if str($mz).strip() != 'None' and str($mz).strip() != '': --mz '$mz' #end if #if str($ox).strip() != 'None' and str($ox).strip() != '': --ox '$ox' #end if #if str($oy).strip() != 'None' and str($oy).strip() != '': --oy '$oy' #end if #if str($oz).strip() != 'None' and str($oz).strip() != '': --oz '$oz' #end if --mesh-output-file output_1.vtu

param.name: lx
param.label: lx
param.help: length of a domain in x direction, (min = 0)

param.name: ly
param.label: ly
param.help: length of a domain in y direction, (min = 0)

param.name: lz
param.label: lz
param.help: length of a domain in z direction, (min = 0)

param.name: nx
param.label: nx
param.help: the number of subdivision in x direction, (min = 0)

param.name: ny
param.label: ny
param.help: the number of subdivision in y direction, (min = 0)

param.name: nz
param.label: nz
param.help: the number of subdivision in z direction, (min = 0)

param.name: dx0
param.label: dx0
param.help: initial cell length in x direction, (min = 0)

param.name: dy0
param.label: dy0
param.help: initial cell length in y direction, (min = 0)

param.name: dz0
param.label: dz0
param.help: initial cell length in z direction, (min = 0)

param.name: dx_max
param.label: dx max
param.help: maximum cell length in x direction, (min = 0)

param.name: dy_max
param.label: dy max
param.help: maximum cell length in y direction, (min = 0)

param.name: dz_max
param.label: dz max
param.help: maximum cell length in z direction, (min = 0)

param.name: ox
param.label: ox
param.help: mesh origin (lower left corner) in x direction

param.name: oy
param.label: oy
param.help: mesh origin (lower left corner) in y direction

param.name: oz
param.label: oz
param.help: mesh origin (lower left corner) in z direction

tool.help: This tool runs the **generateStructuredMesh** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
